column6: at the main hall of the Kompong Cham provincial police commission
column7: Permanent Resident Certificate for  Immigrants were given by Brigadier General Em Kosal
column8: Chief of Police of Kampong Cham province. Also in attendance were Immigration officials and the President and the Vice President of the Vietnamese Association in Kampong Cham. A total of 139 people received the certificates.------Foreigners who are in Cambodia without the correct paperwork were urged top come forward and apply through the proper channels
column9: as the crackdown against illegal residents will continue for the rest of 2018.------http://cambodiapolice.com/policekh/114164
